Police consider further charges after four arrests in Napier homicide inquiry https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/police-consider-further-charges-after-four-arrests-in-napier-homicide-inquiry/IWD42U3CIBD6JBVCVUIQTPQLMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/police-consider-further-charges-after-four-arrests-in-napier-homicide-inquiry/IWD42U3CIBD6JBVCVUIQTPQLMA/ Doug LaingTwo 19-year-olds are among four arrests in the Boy Taylor homicide inquiry Mon, 23 Dec 2024 21:39:42 +0000 Boy Taylor, who died in Napier's Emerson St shopping early on the morning of December 18. Police have charged four people in relation to his injures and are considering further charges. His tangi was being held at Pukemokimoki Marae, with final service on December 24.
